<title level="1" pfs="">[Lyrt Cozurn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2119)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 44

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Lyrt Cozurn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2119)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 40</row>

**Perception** +27; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +31, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +7

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +8
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +28 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 280
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [ &lt;%TRAITS%217%%&gt; ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) &lt;%END>, or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)^ double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 30 feet, DC 33

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pain touch +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 8d6 negative plus 2d6 evil

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 35, attack +31
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will)
- **4th**
[Modify Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=200)
- **5th**
[Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36) (×2), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (at will)

**Inhabit Object** <actions string="Single Action" />  Lyrt possesses a Large or smaller object within 20 feet, making it an [animated object](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=4). This animated object's level can be no higher than Lyrt's level – 2. If the target object is being held by a creature, the bearer can attempt a Will save to prevent the possession. This possession ends when the object is destroyed or Lyrt leaves it. At this point, Lyrt reappears in the object's square and can't Inhabit an Object again for 1d4 rounds.

**Malevolent Possession** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Lyrt attempts to possess an adjacent corporeal creature. This has the same effect as the [_possession_](/Spells.aspx?ID=225) spell with an unlimited duration, except since Lyrt doesn't have a physical body, he is unaffected by that restriction. When Lyrt departs, the target has only confused and incoherent memories of the period during which they were possessed. If a creature dies while possessed by Lyrt and its corpse remains intact, Lyrt can immediately inhabit the corpse (see Inhabit Object) as a reaction, in which case the corpse acts like an animated object.

</column>
name: Lyrt Cozurn
resistance_markdown: all damage 15 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [ <%TRAITS%217%%> ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) <%END>, or [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)^ double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))
resistance_raw: all damage 15 (except  force ,   ghost touch  , or  positive ^ double resistance vs. non- magical )

This animated object's level can be no higher than Lyrt's level – 2. If the target object is being held by a creature, the bearer can attempt a Will save to prevent the possession. This possession ends when the object is destroyed or Lyrt leaves it. At this point, Lyrt reappears in the object's square and can't Inhabit an Object again for 1d4 rounds. Malevolent Possession Two Actions Lyrt attempts to possess an adjacent corporeal creature. This has the same effect as the possession spell with an unlimited duration, except since Lyrt doesn't have a physical body, he is unaffected by that restriction. When Lyrt departs, the target has only confused and incoherent memories of the period during which they were possessed. If a creature dies while possessed by Lyrt and its corpse remains intact, Lyrt can immediately inhabit the corpse (see Inhabit Object) as a reaction, in which case the corpse acts like an animated object.
